# systemDNSSettings

**Instance Property**

The current system DNS settings.

## Declaration

```swift
var systemDNSSettings: [NEDNSSettings]? { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use key-value observing to watch for changes on this parameter.
title: systemDNSSettings
